channel.title: CVE Feed for GE Digital -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE Digital -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-43494|2024-08-03T13:32:59.579Z -- ge%20digital -- proficy%20historian
item.description: An unauthorized user could be able to read any file on the system, potentially exposing sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2022-46660|2024-08-03T14:39:38.606Z -- ge%20digital -- proficy%20historian
item.description: An unauthorized user could alter or write files with full control over the path and content of the file.

item.title: CVE-2022-38469|2024-08-03T10:54:03.672Z -- ge%20digital -- proficy%20historian
item.description: An unauthorized user with network access and the decryption key could decrypt sensitive data, such as usernames and passwords.

item.title: CVE-2022-46331|2024-08-03T14:31:46.209Z -- ge%20digital -- proficy%20historian
item.description: An unauthorized user could possibly delete any file on the system.

item.title: CVE-2022-46732|2024-08-03T14:39:38.304Z -- ge%20digital -- proficy%20historian
item.description: Even if the authentication fails for local service authentication, the requested command could still execute regardless of authentication status.
